TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

summary.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

span.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스에 해당 발급자를 참조 하는 이름을 신뢰할 수 있는 모든 발급자의 인증서를 매핑하는 방법으로 신뢰할 수 있는 발급자 사전 유지 관리 합니다.The class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer. 인증서 지 문의 폼 인코딩된 ASN.1를 사용 하 여 지정 됩니다.The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint. 발급자 이름으로는 응용 프로그램의 범위 내에서 고유한 모든 문자열 수 있습니다.The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application. 이 사전을 통해 액세스할 수는 속성입니다.This dictionary can be accessed through the property. 클래스는 X.509 인증서만 해결할 수 있습니다.The class can only resolve X.509 certificates. 신뢰할 수 있는 발급자의 지도 항목을 추가 하 여 구성 파일에 지정 된 된 [ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) 요소입니다.The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element. `` 의 자식 요소는 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) 요소 되며 유효한 경우는 클래스에 지정 된는 `type` 해당 요소의 특성입니다.The `` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element. 자세한 내용은 각에서 이러한 요소에 대 한 설명서를 참조 하십시오.는 [WIF 구성 스키마](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)합니다.For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9). 발급자 이름 레지스트리에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 클래스입니다.For more information about issuer name registries, see the class. 파생 시켜 사용자 고유의 구성 기반된 발급자 이름 레지스트리 설정 하기로 합니다.You can derive from to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry. 재정의 메서드는 구현에 따라 달라 집니다.Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation. 예를 들어 재정의할 수 있습니다는 메서드를 사용자 지정 구성 스키마에서 구성을 로드 합니다.For example, you can override the method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema. ## Examples 다음 XML 표시에 대 한 구성을 한 보안 토큰 처리기의 컬렉션에 대 한 추가 합니다.The following XML shows configuration for a added for a collection of security token handlers. `` 요소 클래식.NET 구성 컬렉션 처럼 동작 허용는 ``, `` 및 `` 자식 요소로 요소입니다.The `` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the ``, `` and `` elements as child elements. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddTrustedIssuer (string certificateThumbprint, string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddTrustedIssuer(string certificateThumbprint, string name) cil managed
Public Sub AddTrustedIssuer (certificateThumbprint As String, name As String)
public: void AddTrustedIssuer(System::String ^ certificateThumbprint, System::String ^ name);

param.name: certificateThumbprint
param.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.

span.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
The name of the issuer.

summary.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

span.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 발급자를 추가 하려면이 메서드를 호출할 수는 사전입니다.You can call this method to add issuers to the dictionary. 파생된 클래스에서이 메서드를 호출할 수 있습니다는 메서드를 사전에 발급자를 추가 합니다.In derived classes, you can call this method from the method to add issuers to the dictionary.

span.span: is or empty.
-or- is or empty.

exception.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.

span.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.

exception.span: (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

span.span: (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

span.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

value.span: 신뢰할 수 있는 발급자를 포함 하는 사전입니다.

span.span: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 사전에 키 ASN.1 인코딩 형식을 신뢰할 수 있는 발급자의 인증서의 지문 이며 값은 발급자 이름입니다.The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name. 구성에 지정 된 발급자 및 모든 추가 발급자와 추가 된 사전에 포함 되어는 메서드.The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

param.name: securityToken
param.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.

span.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
Should be assignable as .

summary.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

span.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

returns.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

span.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 기본 구현 검색은 사전에 지정 된 X.509 인증서의 지문에 대 한 `securityToken`합니다.The default implementation searches the dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`. 항목이 발견 되는 경우 발급자 이름이 반환 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 `null` 반환 됩니다.If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 경우 `securityToken` 에서 할당할 수 없으면 , `null` 반환 됩니다.If `securityToken` is not assignable from , `null` is returned.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

param.name: customConfiguration
param.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

span.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

summary.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

span.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 구성 인프라 메서드를 호출 합니다.The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 이 메서드를 호출할 때는 `nodelist` 의 최상위 자식 요소가 포함 됩니다는 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) 구성 파일에서 요소입니다.When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 특성이 나 자식 요소가 파생 된 클래스에 대해 정의한 구성 스키마에 따라 이러한 각 들어 차례로 있습니다.Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 이 메서드는 구성 인프라에 의해 호출 됩니다.This method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 기본 구현에서 구성을 로드는 [ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) 요소 (아래에서 구성 된 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)요소).The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element). 파생된 클래스에서 사용자 고유의 사용자 지정 구성 요소에 대 한 지원을 제공 하려면이 메서드를 재정의할 수 있습니다.You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.

span.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
